Text: Important Information Reports Alerts ServiceDear Valued Client As you know we are upgrading your AmeritradeR Reports Alerts Service While we complete the transition to the new service you may experience a disruption with some of your alerts The following alerts are currently being affected Intraday Portfolio Change Alert Daily Portfolio Update Stock Change Alert Weekly Analysis and Portfolio Summary For updates on the status of your alerts during this transition please visit the View Portfolios page of your Reports Alerts Service for current information We are pleased to provide you with this upgraded service to help you make timely and informed trading decisions Thank you for choosing Ameritrade as your online brokerage partner J Peter Ricketts President Private Client Division Ameritrade Ameritrade understands the importance of protecting your privacy If you do not want to receive news about new and valuable Ameritrade services in the future please hit your reply button type unsubscribe in the subject line and send the note Well gladly exclude you from future marketing messages Ameritrade is a registered service mark of Ameritrade Holding Corporation Copyright Ameritrade Inc Member NASDSIPC ATI EM IMAGE
